Verify the 'Next' navigation arrow is enabled and positioned at right 10px
Verify the current image has source 'slide1.jpg', load time under 700ms, no watermark, and alt text 'First slide image'
Perform a search for 'electronics' on 'https://example.com/search'
Verify the search results count shows 'Showing 25 results'
Verify the first result's title 'Noise Cancelling Headphones' has font size 22px and color #0056b3
Verify the product image has source 'headphones.jpg', rendered dimensions 150x150px, and alt text 'Black Noise Cancelling Headphones'
Verify the 'Add to Wishlist' button is enabled and has aria-label 'Add product to wishlist'
Verify the price is displayed as '$199.99' and has font weight 700
Open 'https://example.com/tutorial/video'
Verify the video player controls are visible
Verify the video is initially not muted
Click the 'Fullscreen' button
Confirm the video element has fullscreen status true, width matching viewport width, and height matching viewport height
Ensure the 'Exit Fullscreen' button is now visible
Click the volume icon
Verify the video element's muted status is true and the icon changes source to 'volume_off.svg'
Verify the video has natural dimensions 1920x1080px and load time under 1.5s
